_sText:
Well... this isn't my best work. I started this before Christmas 05, it wasn't very fun to work with, and had tons of problems. All in all it wasn't worth it. I would've added more, but I didn't.

It's just a surf map, it's not very long, pretty easy for most people. I spent most of my effort on the spawn, as you can clearly see (though the displacements are whack). You surf down to the end. If you're good enough there's a special place with a buyzone, some awps and stuff. V8 out with more secrets.

(rerelease from v7)
